title: Leaving
alt: What'll I say -- "I was staring at some cat vomit when I got the news?"
transcript:
[Cueball looks down at a puddle on the floor and speaks to someone out-of-panel.]
Cueball: Hey, while you're out, can you pick up some spray cleaner that works on cat vomit?
Voice: Can do!
Voice: Bye![Cueball extends his arm and faces the leaving person.]
Cueball: ...Wait!
Voice: Yes?
Cueball: Uh. ...You are in my heart always.
Voice: ...?Sometimes, when people leave, I'm seized by a sudden fear that they'll die while they're out, and I'll never forget the last thing I said to them.
